abstract: Wisconsin Gov Scott Walker, who forced public workers to pay more for their pensions as part of plan to curb union rights, breaks campaign promise to pay the full cost of his own pension immediately after taking office in January 2011; his pay stubs reveal he did not start paying full cost until August.
snippet: Gov. Scott Walker, who forced public workers to pay more for their pensions as part of a push to curb union rights, broke a campaign promise to pay the full cost of his own pension.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Scott Walker, who forced public workers to pay more for their pensions as part of a push to curb union rights, broke a campaign promise to pay the full cost of his own pension.

headline.main: Wisconsin: Governor and Lieutenant Broke Promise on Pension Contributions
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Governor and Lieutenant Broke Promise on Pension Contributions
headline.seo: Governor Scott Walker Broke Promise to Pay His Pension
